text: Arne Helge Carlson, Sr. (born September 24, 1934) is an American politician. He was the 37th Governor of Minnesota, from 1991 to 1999. He was a member of the Republican Party. Carlson was born in New York City, New York. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Minnesota Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Arne Carlson
